import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Eventbrite=()=>{const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchEvents=async()=>{try{const response=await api.fetchEventbriteEvents(null,'music','Charlotte, NC');setEvents(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching events:',error);}};fetchEvents();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Eventbrite Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:event.name.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[new Date(event.start.local).toLocaleDateString(),' ',new Date(event.start.local).toLocaleTimeString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.venue.address.localized_address_display})]},event.id))})]});};export default Eventbrite;
